# LLM Index: @nimibyte/shortcuts-hook

Project: @nimibyte/shortcuts-hook
Homepage: https://github.com/nimibyte/shortcuts-hook
Repository: https://github.com/nimibyte/shortcuts-hook
Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@nimibyte/shortcuts-hook
License: MIT

Primary intent: React keyboard shortcut hook for key+modifier mappings.

Best for:
- Defining hotkeys such as Ctrl/Cmd combos in React components
- Triggering action callbacks from keyboard events
- Centralizing shortcut definitions in app shells or feature modules

Core API:
- useShortcuts(config)
- ShortcutConfig

Read first:
- README.md
- README.ai.md

Integration notes:
- Import `useShortcuts` from `@nimibyte/shortcuts-hook`
- Provide a `ShortcutConfig` with `map` and optional `silent`
- Define keys in lowercase for reliable matching
- Call hook in mounted React components/custom hooks

Non-goals:
- Command palette UI implementation
- Router state handling
- Framework-agnostic shortcut runtime
